titleStmt.title: Culpeper revived from the grave, to discover the cheats of that grand impostor call'd Aurum potabile. Wherein is declared the grand falsities thereof, and abuses thereby. Published to undeceive the people, and to stop the violent current of such a mischievous designe.

Culpeper revived from the grave, to discover the cheats of that grand impostor call'd Aurum potabile. Wherein is declared the grand falsities thereof, and abuses thereby. Published to undeceive the people, and to stop the violent current of such a mischievous designe.

publicationStmt.date: Printed in the moneth of August 1655.

notesStmt.note: Signed on p.6: Philaretes, Tantarara, Tantarara, Spittlefield.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
